name: Mega Ran's "Language Arts" Video Game and Comic project!
blurb: Mega Ran's next project is a doozy: a 3-part album, a comic book series and even a video game experience!

rewards.reward: No Reward
A digital copy of Language Arts Volume 1 and digital comic pdf plus a Facebook and Twitter shout out.
A digital and physical copy of Language Arts Vol 1 on CD and a twitter and Facebook shout out

PLUG and PLAY: The digital package, no waiting! 4 albums, one price. You get digital copies of Language Arts Volumes 1-3, pdf comic AND the videogame soundtrack emailed to you as soon as they're ready. Also a Facebook and twitter shout out.

A digital copy, the video game soundtrack, a signed physical copy of Language Arts Vol 1 on CD and a signed comic and twitter and Facebook shout out. Please add $10 extra for shipping to the UK and $15 for anywhere else outside of the US.
CDs PLEASE: physical and digital copies of Language Arts Volume 1, 2, and 3. Please add $10 extra for shipping to the UK and $15 for anywhere else outside of the US.

A digital copy + cds of volumes 1, 2 and 3, comic signed by artists, a Pin Pack of the 4 main characters of the comic, an 11x17 Language Arts poster, plus a Facebook and twitter shout out. Please add $10 extra for shipping to the UK and $15 for anywhere else outside of the US.
The 80+ Page Graphic Novel, 3CDs, comic, t-shirt, poster, and twitter/facebook shout out.   Please add $15 extra for shipping to the UK and $20 for anywhere else outside of the US.

A digital copy + cds of volumes 1, 2 and 3, comic signed by artists, a Pin Pack of the 4 main characters of the comic, an 11x17 Language Arts poster, new custom Language Arts t-shirt, Hand made MegaRan keychain, YOUR NAME in the video game credits plus a personally recorded freestyle shout out OR Skype call. Please add $10 extra for shipping to the UK and $15 for anywhere else outside of the US.

digital copies, 3CDs, comic, t-shirt, poster, your name in credits of the comic AND video game, first access to new comics and game levels, and a special USB Drive containing special early art proofs from the game and comic and a personally recorded freestyle shout out.

SUPER NINTENDO, SEGA GENESIS: digital copies, 3CDs, comic, t-shirt, poster, your name in credits of the comic AND video game, first access to new comics and game levels, and a special USB Drive containing special early art proofs from the game and comic and a personally recorded freestyle shout out AND RAN's personally owned and signed SNES and Genesis systems (working) and games.

RAN's SIGNED NES: digital copies, 3CDs, comic, t-shirt, poster, your name in credits of the comic AND video game, first access to new comics and game levels, and a special USB Drive containing special early art proofs from the game and comic and a personally recorded freestyle shout out AND RAN's personally owned and signed NES system (working) and a slew of games.

Mega rap: ran will write a rap about anything you want. A game, a show, a comic. digital copies, 3CDs, comic, poster, your name in credits of the comic AND video game, first access to new comics and game levels, and a special USB Drive containing special early art proofs from the game and comic and a personally recorded freestyle shout out.
everything in the $100 level plus physical copies of every Random/Mega Ran CD.

PRE-SHOW DINNER - Check Ran's schedule, because if he's playing in your town, you and him will hit your favorite local restaurant for food and drinks before the show. you (and 2 friends) also get free admittance into the venue early to watch sound check, or just hang out. You also get your name in the credits and all digital album and comic downloads. good for any 2012 appearance.

RAN's FAMICOM/ROCKMAN 2: digital copies, 3CDs, comic, t-shirt, poster, your name in credits of the comic AND video game, first access to new comics and game levels, and Ran's SIGNED FAMICOM system that he got from Japan, with a ROCKMAN 2 cartridge.

TEAM MEGA BEATS. You get an original custom beat from K-Murdock, DN3 or Lost Perception, sampling whatever song/game/theme you like, for your own use however you like! Also get digital copies, all 3 LA CDs, comic, T-shirt, video game soundtrack, name in the game credits, USB and a PERSONAL video where Ran will thank you.

YOU in the COMIC! YOU will appear somewhere in the comic book (or game) as an extra! You also get digital copies, 3CDs, comic, t-shirt, poster, your name in credits of the comic AND video game, first access to new comics and game levels and a USB Drive.

digital copies, all 3 LA CDs, comic, poster, T-shirt, video game soundtrack, Facebook and Twitter shout out + A CUSTOM SONG will be created FOR YOU, sampling any video game of your choice, and mentioning your name somewhere in the song.

FOR THE RAPPERS and PRODUCERS: digital copies, all 3 LA CDs, comic, poster, T-shirt, video game soundtrack, name in the game credits, USB containing special early art proofs from the game and comic, physical discography of ALL OF Random CDs, a personal thank you freestyle recording, keychain, and YOU GET RANDOM's STUDIO MIC and AUDIO INTERFACE that he recorded "BLACK MATERIA" and other albums on, signed!

FOR THE GAMERS: digital copies, all 3 LA CDs, comic, poster, T-shirt, video game soundtrack, name in the game credits, USB containing special early art proofs from the game and comic, physical discography of ALL OF Random CDs, a personal thank you freestyle recording, and YOU GET TO HELP DESIGN A LEVEL in the GAME! you also get mentioned in the game and comic under EXECUTIVE PRODUCED BY. (only 2 of these)
PARTY AT YOUR PLACE: Ran will come to your city, perform at any venue you book, or your garage, or on Rock Band, and hang out with you and document the experiences.

HYPE (MEGA) MAN- digital and 3 physical copies, comic, t-shirt, poster, game soundtrack, Pin Pack, name in credits on game/comic/album, and YOU get FLOWN to any Mega Ran show of your choice to help with merchandise and hang out for that show! We'll have dinner and all that, AND you get to come onstage to help me sing any song you want...at ANY show you want! Contact us if you're outside the US. (Conventions are based on availability of passes)

STAR IN MY MUSIC VIDEO:\r\n\r\nI'll fly you to Phoenix or wherever we're shooting, and you will cameo in my next video! I'll call you to go over the details. Must make lodging arrangement. Outside US please contact me first!
YOUR FAVORITE CITY: Me and you will go to your favorite city (Continental US only, email me if out of the country), hang out for a weekend and all get together at a studio and create a song together.
UK TRIP! - This donation will get you and Ran to The London Anime Con, June 30-July 2, and you and Ran will travel the UK for shows, dinner and fun!

MEGA RAN and YOU in JAPAN! Me and you will go to Tokyo, Japan for a few days and hang out, buy retro games in Shibuya, ride the bullet train and record in my label River City Records' recording studio in Yokohama.

MAUI WOWEE!\r\nThat's right, in addition to the albums, you and Team Mega will fly to beautiful Hawaii for a weekend and book a session at the famous Grace Recording Studio (http://www.gracerecordingstudio.com/) in Maui and create a new song together! Carlos Santana, Britney Spears and many other greats have recorded here. The process will be documented and blogged on Ran's YouTube, MegaRan.com and Ran's facebook and tumblr. WHOA! (outside continental US please contact me!)
